thread.title: Why Blue Ivy is having a better holiday than you
thread.title_full: Why Blue Ivy is having a better holiday than you

title: Why Blue Ivy is having a better holiday than you
text:
Why Blue Ivy is having a better holiday than you Last updated 14:39, September 25 2015 Beyonce.com 
Beyonce shared some candid snaps from her recent family holiday. 
She might only be three years old - but with two of the world's most famous celebrities for parents - its no wonder little Blue Ivy Carter is having a better holiday than most people could ever imagine. 
Over the last week, Blue Ivy's mum Beyonce has been busy sharing candid snaps on Instagram and of her family, including rapper/producer husband Jay-Z, on their family holiday. 
The couple reportedly spent US$900,000 (NZ$1,423,000) per week on a luxury yacht to sail around the Mediterranean. Beyonce.com 
Blue Ivy posing with her rapper dad Jay-Z in the background. 
In one of the images, the cute preschooler is seen wearing similar sunglasses to her mum and blowing a kiss to the camera. 
As well as Instagram snaps of the family, Beyonce posted plenty of herself enjoying the relaxation. 
According to The Daily Mail the US$50million "ultra-yacht" hired by the couple is so exclusive, you need to be on first name terms with its multi-millionaire owner to have any chance of getting on board.
